Reviews.Title: Gr8 phone
Reviews.Author: WJPC "WJPC"
Reviews.Content: I have this phone for a while and when it broke, as all phones do, I got the same one. It is the best option for those people that do not want to pay for a data plan and still have a nice phone. For the fancier phones, Sprint makes you get a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Solid little phone
Reviews.Author: the Lorax
Reviews.Content: Pro's:Very small. Will fit comfortably in the smallest of pocketsKeyboard works well. Very little typos madeThe user interface is simple and intuitiveBattery life is pretty goodCon's:Its not a smart phone. Poor choice of apps/games, and sub standard web surfingMany people report having issues with it. The only issue with mine is that it randomly calls my girlfriend. Weird I know. Thats why I took off a starCamera quality is poor, even for cell phone standards.If you are trying to use this like a smartphone, you will be disappointed.If you just use it for the basics; making calls, texting, using the calendar/alarm, then you will be happy with it.I also usually carry an iPod touch with me for using apps, games, taking photos, and other things. Between these two devices, I can do almost everything a smartphone can do (minus 3g internet), without having to pay for an expensive data plan.

Reviews.Title: small
Reviews.Author: tech mom
Reviews.Content: I like the small size and the texting keyboard, but the phone does not last long for teens. A nice phone for an adult that just wants to text and talk.

Reviews.Title: HAPPY WITH MY CELL PHONE
Reviews.Author: Denise J. Marino
Reviews.Content: This is just what I wanted & got it. I had the same phone got damaged & was quite upset & was lucky to find the same one.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE SUCKS!
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: I do not recommend this phone.Sure its great for price, but in the long run its not worth the hassel.Constantly falling out of my pocket, quickly developed scratches.Sometimes it wouldn't even tell me if I had a missed call or text.Wouldn't send pictures.It also constantly called people who I had previously contacted.Apps suck, but on the bright side it has a good battery life.however it has a mind of its own & sometimes doesn't want to cooperate.I would only recommend this phone to someone who will hardly use it.Also the keyboard button letters will rub off if your a huge texter.Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: Please don't pay this much!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I've never had a problem with this phone - it's simple, it has enough processing speed for the things I need. There's nothing fancy about it. It has a good keyboard, it works and feels like a phone should. I like the calendar/alarms.I bought mine for 40 bucks, a used one online - please don't pay $200 for this. Buy something nice for a loved one with the extra $150. :)

Reviews.Title: Awful
Reviews.Author: gnk "gnk"
Reviews.Content: Great at accidentally dialing previously called numbers, since the keyboard moving even a fraction of an inch cancels the keyboard lock.  Not very good call quality.
